itemLabel: Gordon Richardson, Baron Richardson of Duntisbourne

wikipedia_page.main: Gordon William Humphreys Richardson, Baron Richardson of Duntisbourne  (25 November 1915 – 22 January 2010) was a British banker, former lawyer, and former Governor of the Bank of England.
